titleStmt.title: A view of some exceptions to the practical catechisme from the censures affixt on them by the ministers of London, in a book entituled A testimony to the truth of Jesus Christ, &c. / by H. Hammond.
titleStmt.author: Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.

notesStmt.note: Error in paging: no. 2-3 and 6-7 repeated.

Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
